title: Shimano Rolls Out New S-Phyre Road and Gravel Apparel
content:
Shimano’s S-Phyre line of shoes and apparel has a well-established reputation for high-performance and quality, but the newest additions to the apparel range are markedly more elegant and tantalizing. Crafted from premium Italian materials, featuring a contemporary fit and minimal aesthetic, Shimano’s lineup of S-Phyre performance road and newly updated gravel apparel delivers the performance and style to help you ride and look your best this season, even when the pace quickens or the temperatures rise.

New 2025 Gravel Apparel

New items in Shimano’s gravel range include the Evolve Terra Seamless Jersey and Evolve Avventura Bibshorts. Featuring a snug, body-mirroring fit, the Evolve Terra Seamless Jersey delivers the optimal combination of comfort and wind-cheating aero efficiency. Breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps riders cool and dry, and dual-yarn construction yields a unique two-tone design effect. A broad, seamless waistband keeps everything in the ideal riding position on rough terrain. Two rear pockets provide critical and secure carrying space for snacks and other ride essentials, while a seamless band across the top of the pockets alleviates sag, maintaining a snug fit.

Combining Shimano’s Sterrato 2.0 endurance chamois and a large leg pocket for carrying extra gear and snacks, the Evolve Avventura Bibs are built for long days and varying conditions. Soft elastic leg bands with silicon grippers ensure a secure hold while pedaling without sacrificing comfort. Sturdy bib straps cross at the back, offering superior support and comfort for long days on the bike. One large pocket on the right leg offers convenient access for carrying important gear or snacks. Reflective piping and logos enhance visibility in low-light conditions.

2025 S-Phyre Road Range

The 2025 S-Phyre road apparel range consists of the Leggera Short Sleeve Jersey, Leggera Bib Shorts, and Superlight vest. This is a system of apparel crafted for summer conditions and all-out efforts. The S-Phyre road collection is aesthetically on-trend, with minimal graphics and a color palette that, while subdued, features some sultry options. The fit is aero but still accommodating enough for endurance rides and various body types. Sizing has been adjusted to more closely match European sizing, so refer to the sizing guides of each item to be sure you’ll receive the ideal fit.

The Leggera Jersey features reflective elements that enhance visibility in low-light riding conditions. Flat-lying pockets with elastic inner flaps minimize pocket sag, keeping contents secure while maintaining easy access. A lightweight elastic grip band on the back assures the jersey remains in the ideal riding position. Mesh side panels constructed from breathable recycled polyester help vent excess heat, while a light and stretchy mesh layer beneath the pockets further increases ventilation. The Leggera Jersey is made from 85% recycled polyester, lessening environmental impact throughout its product cycle.

The Leggera Bib Shorts utilize a bonded laser cut design with minimal seams to deliver a light, breathable, and sleek fit that snugly hugs the body for enhanced comfort and maximum aerodynamic efficiency. Constructed from supportive Renew Prime fabric from Carvico, the S-PHYRE Leggera Bib Shorts provide the ideal combination of compressive support and comfort-enhancing stretch so you can maintain peak performance. This cutting-edge shell holds with a premium Italian-made In Fuga chamois that features the patented Free-Flow system, which provides breathable shock-absorbing comfort without unwanted bulk.

The S-Phyre Superlight Vest is a packable vest ideal for variable weather conditions. Anatomical 3D construction and stretchy material provide a wrinkle-free aero-enhancing fit, while the durable dual-direction YKK zipper lets you vent heat on the fly and makes it easy to open the lower area of the vest when you need to get into your jersey’s back pockets.

The women’s S-Phyre collection also includes the Leggera Jersey and Bibs, but there is no women’s-specific Superlight Vest offered at this time.
